songs.title: Everything Is Better With Me
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I'm gonna take you down
And I don't fool around
With no talkin'

I'll take you for a ride
I'll make you feel inside
What I'm feelin'

[Chrorus]
And I know
That you'll see
Everything is better with me

And I know
That you'll find
You can't get me out of your mind

[Verse 2]
You'll be hypnotized
By my beady little eyes
You can't help it

And in you're walking sleep
You'll feel it way down deep
And you'll want it

[Chrorus]
And I know
That you'll see
Everything is better with me

And I know
That you'll find
You can't get me out of your mind
I'll light your cigarette

[Verse 3]
And stroke your pretty head
In the mornin'
And when you're laying there

With my fingers in your hair
You'll get thinkin'

[Chrorus]
And I know
That you'll see
Everything is better with me

And I know
That you'll find
You can't get me out of your mind
